channel.title: Comments on: Staff Conversation: Expansion File Support In Corona SDK

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Hi Josh. The best thing to do is for you to post specific questions in the forums. There are a lot of very smart people there who can help and it will be easier to track the conversation.
item.content:encoded: Hi Josh. The best thing to do is for you to post specific questions in the forums. There are a lot of very smart people there who can help and it will be easier to track the conversation.

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description:
Hi There,
I was wondering if someone from your team would be able to help me implementing expansion files. I'm a student, so I'm pretty new to this. I'm writing my first application natively for Android.
Would really appreciate the help! Great Video!
Josh
item.content:encoded:
Hi There,

I was wondering if someone from your team would be able to help me implementing expansion files. I’m a student, so I’m pretty new to this. I’m writing my first application natively for Android.

Would really appreciate the help! Great Video!

Josh
